subject: French Open (Tennis)
Tennis
lead_paragraph: Andy Roddick has managed to reach the fourth round of the French Open for the first time in eight attempts by disposing quickly of the unseeded Marc Gicquel, 6-1, 6-4, 6-4.
snippet: Andy Roddick has managed to reach the fourth round of the French Open for the first time in eight attempts by disposing quickly of the unseeded Marc Gicquel, 6-1, 6-4, 6-4.
